titles.title: To allow for a waiver during non-ozone season of certain reformulated gas requirements.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 9/13/1995--Introduced. Amends the Clean Air Act to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency, upon request of a Governor, to waive prohibitions on the sale of conventional gasoline and corresponding requirements for the purchase of reformulated gasoline during the non-ozone season for any area designated as an ozone nonattainment area if the Administrator determines that the waiver would not prevent or interfere with attainment of a primary national ambient air quality standard in such area.
